entry.title: Welcome to Amigo Documentation
entry.summary: We're excited to launch the official Amigo documentation site. Here you'll find tutorials, API references, and examples to help you get started with multidisciplinary design optimization on HPC systems.
entry.content:
We're excited to launch the official Amigo documentation site. Here you'll find tutorials, API references, and examples to help you get started with multidisciplinary design optimization on HPC systems.

What's Availableâ€‹

  • Complete getting started guide
  • API documentation for all core modules
  • Cart Pole optimal control tutorial
  • Brachistochrone problem example
  • Comprehensive API reference

Check out the Getting Started guide to begin using Amigo!
